title: Poland launches deposit-refund system for drinks bottles and cans
summary: Notes from Poland is run by a small editorial team and is published by an independent, non-profit foundation that is funded through donations from our readers. We cannot do what we do without your support.

short_headline: No, Hamburg has not banned music lessons
title: No, Hamburg has not banned music lessons because they're 'haram'
summary: Not only is it untrue that the city of Hamburg has banned music lessons, but most Muslims have embedded music in their culture, religion and daily lives.

short_headline: Consumentenbond Google must allow users to opt
title: Consumentenbond: Google must allow users to opt out of often inaccurate AI overview
summary: The “AI overview” that now appears when users type a search query into Google is often flawed, and Google does not allow users to permanently disable this AI function.

short_headline: Watch Met Police chief says Panoramas findings
title: Watch: Met Police chief says Panorama's findings are 'horrific'
summary: Met Police chief Sir Mark Rowley has spoken to BBC London after a Panorama investigation found misogyny and racism inside the force.

title: Dutch will fetch seriously ill children from Gaza after all
summary: The Dutch government will take in a limited number of seriously ill children from Gaza for medical treatment after all,...
